name: Tiny World (itch) (Gumb)
description:
Created in Godot 3.2.2

This is not a complete game, it is the result of me learning Godot, and trying to create a 2D "Tiny World" that wraps horizontally.

Move with WASD or arrow keys, attack with space or enter.

You play as a kobold who is fighting dwarves. You win by killing all 5 dwarves in the world.
